properties.name: boot.mvc.log.excludePatterns
properties.description: Http请求日志输出需要忽略的url配置，多个url请用英文逗号分隔.

properties.name: boot.mvc.trace.excludePatterns
properties.description: Http请求耗时监控需要忽略的url配置，多个url请用英文逗号分隔.

properties.name: gw.boot.datasource.url
properties.description: 单数据源配置:db连接信息.

properties.name: gw.boot.datasource.username
properties.description: 单数据源配置:db账号明文.

properties.name: gw.boot.datasource.password
properties.description: 单数据源配置:db密码，若配置pwd-public-key此处值应为密文，反之为明文密码.

properties.name: gw.boot.datasource.pwd-public-key
properties.description: 单数据源配置:db密码公钥，非必填项.
